HelloGrandma.subject: Hello grandma!
HelloGrandma.body:
Finally we got an email set up for you! 

Remember, just send me an email any time if you need help with anything. Oh, and watch out for viruses.

Cheers, Thomas :)

BrickSuitePro.subject: Thank you for subscribing to Brick Suite Pro!
BrickSuitePro.body:
Your computer has now the following programs:
Clown Variable Studio:
Change all your desktop icons to clowns!

ImageShear Pro:
Apply the Shear transformation to images!

ChargeMaster Special Pro:
Enables charging of electronic devices made by Samsung in 2009

WhiteScreen:
Enables white screen mode, making your screen white.

MindTableTennis:
Allows you to imagine playing tennis in front of the computer. Look up tennis rules using our en.wikipedia.org/wiki/tennis module.

DolphinBlock:
Enables mode to block the word 'dolphin',block disabled by default.

AntiAnt Pro:
Keep ants away from your power supply. The program simply increases the amperage in your power supply to always run at maximum capacity, killing any ants that attempt to enter.

To cancel any of these programs, you must reply to this email. We are legally obligated to inform you that we also take letters at: 34th street, Elko, Nevada

BuyTrompo.subject: Thank you for buying our product.
BuyTrompo.body:
Dear Aretha Wonk.
Thank you for buying Trompo Antivirus. You will continue being billed for $100 each week. To cancel your subscription, you must send a letter to our adress at 59128th street, New Dehli. Please note that refund letters must contain your name along with a statement that you want to cancel.

UltraPro.subject: Thank you for buying our product.
UltraPro.body:
Dear Aretha Wonk.
Thank you for buying Trompo Antivirus UltraPro. You will continue being billed for $500 each week. To cancel your subscription, you must send a letter to our adress at 59129th street, New Dehli. Please note that refund letters must contain your name along with a statement that you want to cancel.
 To cancel UltraPro, you must also write a quick review of the product. Positive reviews containing phrases like 'good' will increase your chance of being able to cancel.

JavaInfo.subject: Why should I update java?
JavaInfo.body: You should update java because updating java means we can provide additional services to your computer. Globally, we own more than 200 sharks. Oracle is epic. Being an intern is fucking cool, lol I hope this isn't in prod

BankSetup.subject: Your new online bank account
BankSetup.body:
Hey grandma! Just me again - here are your details for the bank login. 

Username: a.wonk@gmail.com
Password:aretha
PIN: 3914

Make sure to change your password like I showed you - you are very vulnerable to hackers if you keep the temporary password.

Love you, Thomas :)

SurveyGroups.subject: We need volunteers for the survey groups!
SurveyGroups.body:
We need volunteers for our new survey group. You are being contacted because you are in the following target group:

Over 75
Female
Has a computer
Does not know matrix multiplication

Please email us if you are interested in joining the survey group. Tasks involve:

Watching movies and giving feedback

Tasting new products from well-known brands

Filling out surveys online

Your feedback is valuable. Please rate this email: bit.ly/clOwn72.

Saxophone.subject: Thank you for subscribing to our sheet music service.
Saxophone.body: We are grateful that you would like to be our customer. You can cancel the service anytime through your banking system.

4.subject: Money Laundering Scam
4.body:
We have received reports that a company called 'Jones-Barithon Saxophone Shop' is being used as a front for a massive money laundering campaign.
The money is being laundered for a group of scammers in New Dehli, India. If you have been in contact with this company, please respond to this email or send a letter to Bank1 with the reference number.

Reference number: 026-11923

5.subject: Bitcoin Investment Opportunity
5.body:
Hello, it's me, Happy Chapman! Be - happy.

For you madame, I have a very special offer. For an initial payment of only 250 dollars, you will be able to invest in bitcoin.
There is a possible return of 900% on this investment.

If you would like to invest, please write a check to my business address: 'Telegraph Tower, New York' with your name and the sum. Remember to put on the letter that you would like to invest in bitcoin.
I look forward to hear from you madame.

H. Chapman
